Question.Subject: Please help me watch a show on-line!!?
Question.Content: I had to shut off cable because my husband would just watch the tv when he should have been watching our children, so since then I have been relying on the online shows to take abrief break from everyday crap and lately it has been army wives and The bachelor that I have been wanting to watch, but they are not working anymore. I can get them on my screen as before, but the keep needing to buffer I think. The shows pause every 10 seconds or so to "LOAD" apparently whatever that means. Anyway, now my huband is in Iraq, but I am keeping the cable off to save money, but I cant watch anything with my computer this way. It use to work fine. I set my control settings to med-high. Itried deleting all the cookies, but it still did not due much. Ihave a fairly new computer (bought it last year-gateway laptop) Please I just want a break to escape the kids, deployment, etc., can anyone help? Oh and I have att internet service my speed is the lowest to buy but with my new computer should this be happening? Give me ideas!!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
may be some conflicts with your flash player? look for an alternative :)
10 Ways to Watch The Bachelor Online for Free! http://techpp.com/2010/01/01/10-ways-to-watch-the-bachelor-season-14-episodes-online-for-free/

Answer.Content:
may be some conflicts with your flash player? look for an alternative :)
